APPLICATIONS: ['Color Care', 'Hair Care', 'Skin Care', 'Soap & Bath', 'Spa & Wellness', 'Sun Care']
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Color Clay® CYDONIA is a natural quince yellow (ochre) homogeneous powder clay distributed by DKSH Marketing Services Spain, S.A.U. It is composed primarily of illite with a high silicate content and a particle size where 95% of particles are smaller than 44 microns, providing a smooth and pleasant texture. This clay is odourless and exhibits a stable pH of approximately 8.75 in aqueous solution. Rich in minerals such as silica, alumina, calcium oxide, and magnesium oxide, Color Clay® CYDONIA offers excellent absorption capacity, mild exfoliation, and mechanical cleansing properties. Its laminar platelet structure enhances spreadability, making it ideal for use in a wide range of personal care products including facial and body masks, cleansers, soaps, creams, serums, hair masks, and makeup formulations. The natural origin of the clay ensures a unique Mediterranean beige color that may vary slightly between batches, adding naturalness and originality to cosmetic products. It is particularly valued for its ability to absorb excess oils, provide gentle exfoliation, and impart stable natural color, making it a versatile ingredient for enhancing texture, aesthetics, and skin benefits in cosmetic and spa applications.

Color Clay® by Colorclay S.L. is a 100% natural Mediterranean clay product sourced from the Barcelona coastal region, renowned for its rich mineral content and diverse natural colors. Available in a spectrum of shades including reddish-brown, dark brown, golden brown, beige, white, grey, pinkish, and dark grey, these finely ground clays (below 44 microns) possess a laminar silicate crystal structure that imparts excellent absorptive and exfoliating properties. The clays are free from additives and chemicals, preserving their purity and regional authenticity through traditional manufacturing methods. Color Clay® offers multiple benefits such as mild mechanical cleansing, improved skin feel due to its smooth texture and spreadability, and gentle dead cell renewal through mild exfoliation. Rich in minerals similar to those found in skin and cellular constituents, it supports skin health and vitality. Its versatility allows it to be used in a wide range of cosmetic applications including facial and body masks, creamy masks, soaps, emulsions, shampoos, and natural wraps. Additionally, it functions as a natural coloring agent stable across pH levels, an oil absorber in facial masks, and a mild exfoliator in creams and serums. Color Clay® is also environmentally sustainable, with the manufacturer committed to reforestation and land restoration efforts. This product embodies a pure Mediterranean treasure, ideal for enhancing personal care formulations with natural efficacy and aesthetic appeal.

ACTIVE JUICE CAVOLO NERO (KALE) from Phenbiox s.r.l. is a fresh vegetal juice derived from kale leaves (Brassica oleracea acephala). Presented as a water-based solution with a characteristic color and odor, it contains 20% kale juice along with citric acid, sodium benzoate, and potassium sorbate as preservatives. The product has an acidic pH ranging from 2.6 to 3.5 and is free from pathogens, ensuring high microbial quality. This natural, GMO-free juice concentrate is primarily used as an ingredient in cosmetic formulations, offering potent antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and moisturizing properties. Rich in vitamins and bioactive compounds, it supports skin nourishment, collagen production, and hydration, helping to protect against oxidative stress and premature aging. Additionally, it promotes scalp health and hair growth, making it a valuable additive for enhancing the efficacy of personal care products. The juice should be stored in a cool, dry place away from light and heat to maintain its quality, with a shelf life of 12 months.

AQUPEC MG N40R, manufactured by Sumitomo Seika Chemicals Co., Ltd., is a water-soluble, cross-linked acrylic polymer known chemically as partially neutralized carboxyvinyl polymer sodium salt, with the INCI name Sodium Carbomer. It appears as a white, pre-neutralized powder composed of spherical particles sized between 10 to 30 micrometers, offering excellent flowability and ease of handling. This polymer exhibits high thickening capability even at low concentrations, producing fresh and light textures in formulations without the need for additional neutralization, thus simplifying processing and maintaining pH stability around neutral. Its unique spherical structure enables the formation of highly viscous gels with excellent sprayability, making it ideal for sprayable products that require high viscosity without compromising application performance. AQUPEC MG N40R is widely used in personal care products such as all-in-one gel creams, deodorant gels, milky lotions, hair care, skin care, and make-up formulations, where it functions as a thickening agent, stabilizer, and texture enhancer. It imparts a smooth, light, and moisturizing feel, reduces creasing, and provides mattifying and soft focus effects, improving the sensory experience and aesthetic appeal of cosmetic products. Recognized for its innovative sensory properties, AQUPEC MG N40R received the Sensory Award Bronze at in-cosmetics Global 2019, underscoring its value in advanced cosmetic formulations.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: In guideline formulation examples, AQUPEC MG N40R is used at concentrations of 0.90% in gel cream and 0.20% in milky lotion. It can be added at any stage of formulation, including at the end for viscosity adjustment. No specific dosage frequency or administration route is applicable as it is a polymer used in topical formulations.

SUPPLIER_NAME: ASSESSA INDÚSTRIA, COMÉRCIO E EXPORTAÇÃO LTDA.
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ACTIMULSI GA 20, manufactured by ASSESSA INDÚSTRIA, COMÉRCIO E EXPORTAÇÃO LTDA., is a natural multifunctional bioactive ingredient derived from the exudate of Acacia Senegal. It is composed primarily of Acacia Senegal Gum Extract, a complex branched heteropolysaccharide rich in galactose, glucose, rhamnose, xylose, and uronic acids, along with potassium sorbate and sodium benzoate as preservatives. This ingredient appears as a water-soluble, film-forming polysaccharide that acts as a co-emulsifying natural agent, stabilizing emulsions and reducing the need for synthetic emulsifiers in cosmetic formulations. ACTIMULSI GA 20 offers multiple benefits including anti-inflammatory and soothing properties, making it suitable for sensitive skin applications. It promotes skin regeneration by stimulating collagen I and III synthesis and improves the sensory attributes of emulsions by providing a dry, silky touch upon skin contact. Additionally, it enhances hair care products by improving softness, combability, and gloss. Its natural origin and biodegradability make it an environmentally friendly choice for moisturizing creams, lotions, anti-aging emulsions, night creams, and scalp serums, typically used at concentrations ranging from 1.0% to 3.0%. Overall, ACTIMULSI GA 20 is a versatile, effective, and sustainable ingredient that supports the development of stable, pleasant, and skin-friendly personal care products.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: For moisturizing creams: 1.0 to 2.0%; for moisturizing lotions, anti-ageing emulsions, night creams, and serums for the scalp: 1.5 to 3.0%.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Celluloscrub 200 by Lessonia is a natural exfoliating ingredient derived from modified cellulose extracted from sustainably sourced wood pulp. It is produced through a process involving grinding, sieving, and decontamination of cellulose acetate, resulting in a white, stable, and biodegradable powder. This ingredient serves as an eco-friendly alternative to polyethylene microbeads commonly used in personal care products, offering similar performance characteristics such as abrasiveness, suspension capacity, and stability without affecting the product's color or pH. Celluloscrub 200 is GMO-free, palm oil-free, gluten-free, and vegan, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of cosmetic formulations. It is widely used in facial and body scrubs, cleansing lotions, creams, shower gels, hand soaps, bar soaps, and foot scrubs to provide gentle yet effective exfoliation by removing dead skin cells, promoting smoother and more radiant skin. Its excellent suspension properties help maintain the uniform distribution of exfoliating particles, enhancing product texture and efficacy. By incorporating Celluloscrub 200, manufacturers can develop sustainable, high-performance personal care products that meet growing consumer demand for natural and environmentally responsible ingredients.

Celluloscrub 300 by Lessonia is a natural exfoliating ingredient composed of 100% cellulose acetate derived from sustainably managed European and North American wood pulp forests. This modified cellulose acetate is processed through grinding, sieving, and decontamination to produce a biodegradable, renewable, and environmentally friendly exfoliant designed to replace polyethylene microbeads in personal care formulations. Celluloscrub 300 offers excellent color stability, suspension capacity, and consistent abrasiveness, making it ideal for use in body scrubs, facial cleansers, and shower gels. It is compatible with a wide range of cosmetic formulations, including surfactant gels and aqueous lotions, without affecting the product's pH or color. The ingredient exhibits excellent skin tolerance, suitable for sensitive skin, and aligns with global environmental regulations due to its biodegradability and natural origin. By incorporating Celluloscrub 300, manufacturers can create effective, sustainable, and skin-friendly exfoliating products that meet consumer demand for eco-conscious personal care solutions.

Celluloscrub 500 by Lessonia is a natural exfoliating ingredient composed of 100% cellulose acetate derived from sustainably managed European and North-American wood pulp forests. This finely processed material undergoes grinding, sieving, and decontamination to produce a biodegradable, renewable, and eco-friendly alternative to traditional polyethylene microbeads used in personal care products. Celluloscrub 500 offers excellent skin tolerance and matches the performance of synthetic exfoliants in terms of color stability, abrasiveness, and suspension capacity, making it suitable for a wide range of applications including facial care, body care, hand care, shower gels, and foot scrubs. Its formulation stability ensures it does not affect the color or pH of cosmetic products, while its natural origin and compliance with global cosmetic regulations highlight its safety and sustainability credentials. Free from allergens, preservatives, heavy metals, and animal-derived substances, Celluloscrub 500 supports environmentally conscious skincare formulations that meet consumer demand for effective, gentle, and sustainable exfoliation solutions.

Celluloscrub 1000 by Lessonia is a natural exfoliating ingredient composed entirely of modified cellulose derived from sustainably managed European and North American wood pulp. This finely processed cellulose acetate is designed as an eco-friendly and biodegradable alternative to traditional polyethylene microbeads commonly used in personal care products. Celluloscrub 1000 offers excellent color stability, consistent abrasiveness, and superior suspension capacity, ensuring even distribution and effective exfoliation without irritating the skin. Its 100% renewable origin, combined with its compatibility across a wide range of formulations such as shower gels, facial cleansers, body washes, hair mousses, and styling creams, makes it a versatile choice for formulators seeking sustainable and high-performance exfoliating agents. Additionally, it is free from allergens, preservatives, GMO materials, and harmful substances, aligning with stringent cosmetic regulations and environmental standards. Celluloscrub 1000 supports the growing demand for sustainable personal care ingredients by providing a safe, biodegradable, and globally approved solution that enhances skin smoothness and radiance while minimizing environmental impact.

Celluloscrub XLS by Lessonia is a natural, biodegradable exfoliating agent derived from modified cellulose extracted from sustainably managed European and North American wood pulp. This innovative ingredient is designed to replace polyethylene microbeads in personal care products, offering equivalent performance in terms of color stability, abrasiveness, suspension capacity, and formulation stability. Composed of 100% cellulose acetate, Celluloscrub XLS is renewable and environmentally responsible, aligning with eco-friendly cosmetic formulations. It is pH neutral and free from allergens, preservatives, heavy metals, and harmful substances, ensuring safety and regulatory compliance worldwide. Its physical form as fine cellulose particles provides effective exfoliation, promoting smoother skin texture by gently removing dead skin cells. Celluloscrub XLS is ideal for use in shower gels, body washes, hand soaps, bar soaps, and foot scrubs, delivering a natural scrubbing action while supporting sustainability goals. Manufactured through grinding, sieving, and decontamination processes, including heating and gamma-ray treatments, it ensures high purity and quality. This product is vegan, gluten-free, palm oil-free, and free from animal-derived materials, making it suitable for a wide range of cosmetic applications focused on environmental responsibility and skin care efficacy.

MICROZEST 25 Celluloscrub is a biodegradable exfoliant produced by Lessonia, derived entirely from cellulose acetate obtained through a meticulous process of grinding, sieving, and decontamination. This 100% cellulose acetate ingredient originates from sustainably managed European and North American forests, ensuring an eco-friendly and renewable source. Physically, it is a micronized powder designed to replace polyethylene microbeads in cosmetic formulations, providing gentle yet effective exfoliation by removing dead skin cells without irritation. Its compatibility with various personal care products such as facial and body scrubs, cleansers, masks, shower gels, emulsions, and gels highlights its versatility and formulation stability. MICROZEST 25 Celluloscrub aligns with modern cosmetic regulations and safety standards, being free from allergens, preservatives, heavy metals, and animal-derived substances, and is certified vegan, kosher, halal, gluten-free, and palm oil-free. Its biodegradability and absence of microplastic beads make it an environmentally responsible choice for sustainable product development. Overall, MICROZEST 25 Celluloscrub offers formulators a natural, safe, and effective exfoliating agent that supports the growing demand for green and sustainable personal care products.

Celluloscrub GRENN 300 by Lessonia is a biodegradable exfoliating ingredient composed of modified cellulose acetate derived from sustainably managed European and North American wood pulp forests. This finely processed cellulose acetate is obtained through grinding, sieving, and decontamination, resulting in a natural, plant-based exfoliant with excellent skin tolerance. Designed as a sustainable alternative to polyethylene microbeads, Celluloscrub GRENN 300 offers comparable performance characteristics such as consistent abrasiveness, color stability, and superior suspension capacity in various personal care formulations including cleansers, scrubs, masks, and body washes. The product is 100% renewable, biodegradable, free from allergens, preservatives, heavy metals, and harmful substances, and complies with global cosmetic regulations. Its eco-friendly profile supports the development of environmentally responsible personal care products, making it an ideal choice for manufacturers seeking to replace synthetic exfoliants with a natural, effective, and safe alternative.

Celluloscrub GRENN 500 by Lessonia is a biodegradable exfoliating agent composed entirely of modified cellulose acetate derived from sustainably sourced wood pulp. This natural exfoliant is designed as an eco-friendly alternative to traditional polyethylene microbeads, offering similar performance in personal care formulations while addressing environmental concerns related to plastic pollution. The product is a fine, plant-based powder that provides effective exfoliation by gently removing dead skin cells, promoting smoother and more radiant skin. Celluloscrub GRENN 500 maintains excellent color stability and consistent abrasiveness in various formulations, including surfactant gels and aqueous lotions, without affecting the product's pH or color. It exhibits excellent skin compatibility, minimizing irritation risks, making it suitable for a wide range of personal care products such as facial cleansers, body scrubs, shower gels, soaps, and foot scrubs. Manufactured in France by Lessonia, this ingredient is free from allergens, preservatives, heavy metals, and animal-derived substances, aligning with vegan, halal, kosher, and gluten-free standards. Its sustainable sourcing, combined with its high performance and safety profile, makes Celluloscrub GRENN 500 an ideal choice for formulators seeking effective, stable, and environmentally responsible exfoliating ingredients.

Celluloscrub GRENN 1000 by Lessonia is a natural exfoliating ingredient composed of modified cellulose derived from sustainably managed European and North-American wood pulp. This biodegradable and renewable ingredient is designed as an environmentally friendly alternative to polyethylene microbeads commonly used in personal care products. It offers excellent exfoliation properties, effectively removing dead skin cells and impurities to improve skin texture and appearance. Celluloscrub GRENN 1000 maintains consistent color stability, abrasiveness, and suspension capacity over time, even under challenging conditions such as incubation at 55°C, ensuring reliable performance throughout the product's shelf life. It is compatible with a wide range of formulations including shower gels, emulsions, oil gels, and water-based cosmetic gels, suitable for both rinse-off and leave-on applications. The product is 100% cellulose acetate, free from allergens, preservatives, heavy metals, and harmful substances, and complies with global cosmetic regulations. Manufactured in France by Lessonia, Celluloscrub GRENN 1000 supports sustainable and responsible cosmetic development by replacing plastic microbeads with a safe, effective, and eco-friendly exfoliant.

A-Leen 5, manufactured by Minasolve, is a multifunctional, sustainable ingredient primarily composed of Pentylene Glycol derived from upcycled sugarcane bagasse, a renewable byproduct of food production. This clear, colorless liquid is odorless or has a faint scent and is produced through a green-chemistry process, replacing traditional petroleum-based Pentylene Glycol with a nature-derived alternative. A-Leen 5 is COSMOS- and NATRUE-approved, reflecting its compliance with natural and organic cosmetic standards. It functions as an emollient, skin humectant, solubilizer, and antimicrobial protection agent, providing a pleasant, non-tacky, and non-oily skin feel. Its moisturizing effect is long-lasting and comparable to glycerin, while its broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity effectively protects against yeasts, molds, and bacteria, making it suitable as a standalone preservative or as a preservative booster. A-Leen 5 is especially suitable for natural cosmetic products, including skin care, hair care, makeup, perfumes, and toiletries. It enhances formulation stability by solubilizing lipophilic ingredients in aqueous solutions and facilitates the dispersion of gelling agents like xanthan gum, improving formulation efficiency. Its versatility, combined with its sustainable origin and regulatory approvals, makes A-Leen 5 an excellent choice for manufacturers seeking high-performance, eco-friendly ingredients in personal care formulations.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: Recommended use level: 0.5 to 5.0 %; For optimum antimicrobial efficacy in emulsions, add to aqueous phase or post-emulsification stage; Examples in formulations include 2.0% in O/W-emulsion and 3.0% in Wellbeing body cream.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ANGELICA EXTRACT from DKSH Marketing Services Spain, S.A.U. is a yellow brown liquid composed primarily of water (over 50%), butylene glycol (25-50%), and Angelica keiskei leaf and stem extract (1-5%). Derived from the Angelica keiskei plant, also known as Ashitaba, this water-soluble extract is rich in bioactive compounds such as chalconoids, which contribute to its potent antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and antimicrobial properties. Traditionally used in regional cuisine and medicinal applications, Angelica extract is valued in personal care formulations for its ability to stimulate collagen production, promote skin elasticity, and reduce signs of aging like fine lines and wrinkles. It also helps even out skin tone by regulating melanin production, soothes irritated and sensitive skin, and provides hydration to maintain skin suppleness. In hair care, it nourishes hair follicles, potentially stimulating hair growth, improving scalp health, and reducing dandruff through its anti-inflammatory effects. The extract is recommended for incorporation at 1.0% to 5.0% dosage, preferably added at the final phase of formulation at around 40°C to preserve its active structure. Packaged in 20 kg containers, ANGELICA EXTRACT offers a versatile, natural ingredient for enhancing skin and hair health in cosmetic and personal care products, backed by a shelf life of at least 24 months when stored properly in a tightly closed, lightproof container at room temperature.
CLAIMS: ['Anti-Aging', 'Anti-Bacterial', 'Anti-Dandruff', 'Anti-Inflammatory', 'Anti-Itching', 'Anti-Microbial', 'Anti-Oxidant', 'Anti-Wrinkle', 'Brightening', 'Elasticity', 'Firming', 'Free Radical Scavenger', 'Hair Loss Reduction', 'Moisturizing', 'Nourishing', 'Redness Reduction', 'Scalp Protection', 'Sebum Control', 'Skin Radiance', 'Soothing']

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ACTIFCOL™ advanced botanical ingredient, manufactured by LIPOTEC USA, INC., is a light to medium amber liquid composed primarily of water, glycerin, sodium citrate, and a key active component, Lentinus Edodes Extract derived from shiitake mushrooms. This advanced botanical ingredient is designed to enhance collagen functionality, supporting firmer and more youthful-looking skin. It works by increasing type I collagen and PLOD1 levels while reducing carbamylation, a process that deteriorates skin proteins such as collagen. The formulation is 97.97% natural origin and free from animal-derived ingredients, making it suitable for vegetarians and vegans. ACTIFCOL™ is widely used in personal care products, especially skin care formulations targeting skin firmness and restructuring, with demonstrated visible improvements in skin tightness and smoothness on the face, neck, and décolleté. It is compliant with multiple international cosmetic regulations and holds certifications including COSMOS-Ecocert and Halal. The ingredient is stable with a shelf life of 24 months when stored properly and is recommended for use at concentrations between 2% and 10% in cosmetic formulations.

APPLICATIONS: ['Baby Care', 'Bath & Toilet Cleaner', 'Hair Care', 'Skin Care', 'Soap & Bath']
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CEDEPAL TD-403 MFLD, manufactured by Stepan Company, is a clear liquid anionic surfactant composed primarily of sodium trideceth sulfate (C13H27(OCH2CH2)nOSO3Na). This mild, branched-chain alkyl ether sulfate is known for its excellent wetting and foaming properties, making it highly suitable for use in personal care products such as shampoos, liquid hand soaps, bath products, facial cleansers, and baby care formulations. The product exhibits a pH of 8.3 in a 10% aqueous solution and contains 30% active ingredients, ensuring effective cleansing performance while maintaining gentleness on skin and hair. CEDEPAL TD-403 MFLD also functions as an emulsifying agent, helping to stabilize formulations by combining oil and water phases. Its mildness and biodegradability make it an ideal choice for sensitive applications, including baby products and facial cleansers. The product is preserved with formaldehyde and is available in bulk and 55-gallon drums. It is listed on major chemical inventories worldwide, ensuring regulatory compliance. Overall, CEDEPAL TD-403 MFLD offers formulators a versatile, effective, and gentle surfactant option for a wide range of personal care applications.

Mandelic acid from R.L. Chemicals Industries PVT, Ltd. is a white crystalline powder with the chemical formula C8H8O3 and a molecular weight of 152.14. It is an aromatic alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) belonging to the second generation of hydroxy acids, known for its gentle yet effective peeling power without the common disadvantages of irritation. The molecule's larger size compared to glycolic acid results in slower skin penetration, making it well tolerated even by sensitive skin types. Mandelic acid has a pKa of approximately 3.41 and is soluble in water, with a melting range of 131–134°C. It is widely used in skincare for improving skin texture by reducing fine wrinkles and lines without causing erythema or irritation. Its lightening action effectively treats dermal and epidermal melasma and other hyperpigmentation issues, suitable for dark and sensitive skin due to its non-inflammatory nature. Additionally, mandelic acid exhibits antibacterial properties, making it ideal for acne treatment and managing occasional breakouts. It is also used in anti-aging products, photo-aged skin rejuvenation, and pre- and post-laser treatments to prevent bacterial infections. Recommended usage levels range up to 40% for resurfacing peels and around 10% for daily applications, with a buffered pH of 3 to 4. Overall, this mandelic acid product offers a versatile and gentle solution for exfoliation, skin renewal, acne management, and pigmentation correction, making it a valuable ingredient in personal care formulations.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: Up to 40% for resurfacing peeling; approximately 10% for daily uses; buffer pH 3 to 4
CLAIMS: ['Anti-Aging', 'Anti-Bacterial', 'Anti-Dandruff', 'Anti-Itching', 'Anti-Microbial', 'Anti-Oxidant', 'Anti-Wrinkle', 'Brightening', 'Elasticity', 'Firming', 'Free Radical Scavenger', 'Moisturizing', 'Pore Refiner', 'Purifying', 'Scalp Protection', 'Skin Barrier Function', 'Skin Radiance', 'Skin Renewal', 'Smoothing', 'Soothing']

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: DERMA-CLERA™ by RADIANT is a light yellow botanical extract composed primarily of Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Butylene Glycol, and Water. It is designed as a multifunctional ingredient for personal care and cosmetic products, including hair care, body care, facial care, and baby care formulations. DERMA-CLERA™ is specifically formulated to enhance the skin barrier and provide effective treatment for sensitive skin conditions such as atopic dermatitis and psoriasis. Its mechanism of action includes strengthening the skin barrier, delivering anti-inflammatory and soothing effects, and promoting wound healing and skin regeneration. Clinical tests have demonstrated its ability to normalize keratinocyte differentiation markers (Keratin 10 and Keratin 16), reduce inflammation-related cytokines, and visibly improve skin and scalp conditions, including psoriasis lesions and scalp redness or dandruff. The product is preservative-free, has a shelf life of two years, and is recommended for use at concentrations ranging from 0.1% to 2%. DERMA-CLERA™ is a versatile and effective ingredient that supports skin health by alleviating erythema, itching, redness, and chronic inflammation, making it highly suitable for sensitive and troubled skin applications in both cosmetic and personal care products.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: 0.1 - 2% for general use; 5% DERMA-CLERA™ cream applied twice daily for 4 weeks for psoriasis lesions; 2% DERMA-CLERA™ hair mask applied once every 2 days for 2 weeks for scalp soothing
CLAIMS: ['Anti-Dandruff', 'Anti-Inflammatory', 'Anti-Itching', 'Gene Expression Modulation', 'Immuno Modulation', 'Redness Reduction', 'Scalp Protection', 'Skin Barrier Function', 'Skin Repair', 'Soothing', 'Wound Healing']

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Decorinyl functional ingredient, developed by Lipotec, is a biomimetic tetrapeptide designed to mimic the sequences of decorin, a small leucine-rich proteoglycan that specifically binds to collagen fibrils. This ingredient is presented as a suspension containing 0.2% active peptide within a liposomal system, which enhances skin penetration and efficacy. Its composition includes water, lecithin, tripeptide-10 citrulline, carbomer, triethanolamine, caprylyl glycol, and phenoxyethanol, and it is paraben-free. Decorinyl regulates collagen fibrillogenesis by controlling fibril diameter and spacing, which improves skin suppleness, tonicity, and mechanical properties. Clinical studies demonstrate a 54% increase in skin suppleness after 28 days of use at a 5% dosage, making it ideal for cosmetic formulations targeting mature skin to enhance firmness, elasticity, and resilience. Its natural origin content of over 98% aligns with consumer demand for natural ingredients, and it is dispersible in water, facilitating formulation versatility in personal care products aimed at skin restructuring and anti-aging benefits.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: 5% applied daily on face for 28 days

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: 3-Methoxypropylamine, supplied by BASF Corporation, is a high-purity chemical intermediate with a minimum assay of 99.0%, ensuring exceptional quality for industrial applications. It is a clear, colorless liquid characterized by an ammonia-like odor and is free from foreign matter, with water content limited to a maximum of 0.50 wt% and color not exceeding 15 APHA. This compound is widely valued in the personal care industry for its multifunctional properties, including its role as an effective emulsifier that enhances the stability and performance of formulations such as shampoos, conditioners, and skin creams. Additionally, 3-Methoxypropylamine serves as a corrosion inhibitor in water treatment systems used in personal care manufacturing, helping to maintain equipment integrity and product safety. It also acts as a key intermediate in the synthesis of dispersed dyes like Turquoise Blue S-GL, which are utilized in coloring cosmetic products, thereby contributing to their aesthetic appeal. The versatility and high purity of BASF's 3-Methoxypropylamine make it a valuable ingredient for improving the quality, stability, and visual attributes of various personal care products.

Amaze™ Nordic Barley by Nouryon is a 100% natural, unmodified starch derived from Hordeum Vulgare Seed Flour, sourced regionally from Scandinavia as a sustainable by-product of the beverage industry. This fine, white, free-flowing powder features a unique singular oblate spheroid morphology that imparts exceptional visual and sensory benefits in cosmetic formulations. It is COSMOS approved, ECOCERT certified, GMO-free, and produced without additives or irradiation, ensuring excellent microbial purity and biodegradability. Amaze™ Nordic Barley excels in oil absorption, making it ideal for controlling shine and reducing tackiness in skin and sun care products, effectively replacing synthetic microplastics like Nylon-12 and PMMA. In hair care, it provides a smooth, natural feel in dry shampoos and styling products such as pomades and waxes, enabling conditioning claims without cetrimonium chloride and delivering natural styling with volume and less dryness compared to other starches. In color cosmetics, its fine particle size and unique morphology create a light-scattering effect that blurs imperfections, softens wrinkles, and offers a nude, youthful appearance with seamless coverage. Compatible with a wide range of formulation ingredients, including emulsifiers, oils, UV filters, and preservatives, Amaze™ Nordic Barley enhances texture, aesthetics, and performance across skin, hair, and color cosmetic applications, meeting the growing demand for eco-conscious, clean-label, and sustainable personal care ingredients.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: Suggested use levels vary by application: Dry shampoo 2-5%, Waxes and Pomades 1-10%, Creams and Emulsions 2-10%, Color cosmetics 5-50%. Specific example formulations use 5% Amaze Nordic Barley in face cream, sunscreen, and dry shampoo, and 2% in texture spray. It is typically added below 45°C by sprinkling or slurring with glycerin or propylene glycol.
CLAIMS: ['Anti-Aging', 'Anti-Wrinkle', 'Brightening', 'Conditioning', 'COSMOS Standard', 'Hair Volume', 'Mattifying', 'Natural Cosmetic', 'Sebum Control', 'Skin Radiance', 'Smoothing', 'Soft Focus', 'Texturizer', 'Vegan']

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CELLUFLOW C-25, manufactured by JNC CORPORATION, is a hydrophilic spherical cellulose powder derived from plant-based pulp, featuring a porous spherical structure with an average particle size predominantly between 4 to 12 micrometers. This natural cellulose micro-particle exhibits a smooth texture and high air permeability, making it highly suitable as a cosmetic ingredient. Its unique porous structure acts like a microsponge, enabling it to absorb both water and oil effectively, which enhances the texture, spreadability, and functional performance of cosmetic formulations. CELLUFLOW C-25 is physically and chemically stable, maintaining its shape and properties over time without dissolving, and is hypoallergenic, ensuring safety for skin applications. It is widely used in various personal care products such as foundations, lipsticks, eye shadows, milky lotions, and skin lotions, where it improves uniform application, reduces friction, controls sebum, and contributes to a smooth, light texture. Additionally, CELLUFLOW C-25 serves as an eco-friendly alternative to microplastic beads, aligning with sustainability goals in cosmetic development. Its high water absorption capacity (~2.2 g/g) and significant oil absorption (~80 ml/100g) further support its role in enhancing product performance and user experience.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: In application formulations, CELLUFLOW C-25 is used at concentrations of 2.0% to 10.0% depending on the product type: 10.0% in foundation, 2.0% in milky lotion, and 3.0% in lip color paste.
FILE_NAME: PIM000052694-20170920 TDS Celluflow C-25 and TA-25.pdf

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CELLUFLOW TA-25, manufactured by JNC CORPORATION, is a hydrophobic spherical cellulose acetate powder composed of smooth, porous particles predominantly sized between 4 to 12 micrometers. This plant-based material is renowned for its time-tested use as a cosmetic base, offering a smooth texture and superior spreadability on the skin due to its spherical shape. Its unique microsponge structure enables it to absorb both water and oil effectively, swelling to add a distinctive texture while facilitating the slow release and breathability of active ingredients. CELLUFLOW TA-25 exhibits high oil absorption capacity, the highest among comparable powders, and moderate water absorption, making it ideal for moisture control in cosmetic formulations. Physically and chemically stable, it maintains its shape and performance over time without dissolving. Its hydrophobic and lipophilic nature enhances its compatibility with various cosmetic products, including foundations, lipsticks, emulsions, antiperspirant powders, and skin lotions. Additionally, its natural cellulose origin ensures low skin irritation, making it suitable for sensitive skin formulations. The powder's ability to emulsify water and oil without surfactants supports the development of gentler, surfactant-free products. Overall, CELLUFLOW TA-25 is a versatile ingredient that improves texture, application, and moisture management, contributing to high-quality, long-lasting personal care products.
FILE_NAME: PIM000052694-20170920 TDS Celluflow C-25 and TA-25.pdf

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Demecare® Acacia senegal I, manufactured by Alland & Robert, is a natural, high-quality gum derived from the dried exudation of Acacia senegal tree stems and branches. Presented as a white or yellow-white alveolar structured spray-dried powder, it is odorless, tasteless, and offers excellent flow, dispersibility, and rapid solubility at room temperature. Composed mainly of high molecular weight polysaccharides and their calcium, magnesium, and potassium salts, it hydrolyzes into sugars such as arabinose, rhamnose, galactose, and glucuronic acid. This vegan, non-GMO, organic, and pesticide-free ingredient complies with multiple international cosmetic and food additive regulations, ensuring safety and quality. Demecare® Acacia senegal I functions as a versatile texturizing, emulsifying, thickening, film-forming, adhesion, binding, and suspension agent. It enhances the texture, stability, and moisturizing properties of personal care products, including skin care creams, serums, sunscreens, makeup formulations like foundations and mascaras, and hair care products. Its film-forming ability imparts a tightening effect and improves product longevity, while its natural origin supports sustainability and biodegradability. With a stable shelf life of three years when stored properly, Demecare® Acacia senegal I is an ideal ingredient for clean, natural, and effective cosmetic formulations.

DemeCare Acacia senegal I is a 100% natural, biodegradable vegetal gum derived from the exudation of the Acacia senegal tree, supplied by Alland & Robert. This natural gum is presented in a fluid texture with Newtonian behavior and is easily soluble in both hot and cold liquids, allowing solubilization up to 40% concentration. It is stable across a wide pH range (4 to 10) and resistant to temperature variations, making it highly versatile for cosmetic formulations. Certified COSMOS and rated at the maximum level according to ISO 16128 standards, DemeCare Acacia senegal I meets stringent organic and sustainable criteria. Functionally, it serves as a texturing agent, film-forming agent, emulsifier, adhesion and binding agent, emulsion stabilizer, and suspension agent, providing a silky effect, shine, moisturizing, and tightening benefits to skin. Its multifunctional properties enable it to replace several additives, simplifying formulations while enhancing product stability and sensory qualities. It is widely used in natural care products such as skincare creams, serums, lotions, cleansing gels, sun care products, and decorative cosmetics including mascaras, eyeliners, and lipsticks. The gum supports ethical and sustainable development by sustaining local African communities and contributing to environmental benefits like soil fertility and water cycle regulation. Packaged typically in 25 kg bags, DemeCare Acacia senegal I is a key ingredient for formulators seeking natural, organic, and plant-based solutions that align with consumer demand for clean, sustainable, and effective cosmetic ingredients.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: In the example of application (exfoliating gel formula), DemeCare Acacia senegal I is used at 0.92% concentration in the formulation.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: DemeCare Acacia senegal S is a 100% natural, spray-dried Acacia senegal gum produced by Alland & Robert, designed specifically for use in natural and organic cosmetics. This vegetal gum is obtained from the exudate of the Acacia senegal tree, harvested sustainably to support local communities and environmental restoration. It is biodegradable, organic, and COSMOS-certified, ensuring environmentally respectful production without petrochemical ingredients or GMOs. The product exhibits multifunctional properties including texturing, tightening, adhesion, binding, emulsifying, film-forming, and suspensoid effects, making it highly versatile for cosmetic formulations. It dissolves easily in hot or cold liquids up to 40% concentration, displaying a fluid texture with Newtonian behavior and stability across a wide pH range (4 to 10) and temperature variations. DemeCare Acacia senegal S enhances the sensory profile of products by imparting a silky effect, shine, and moisturizing benefits, while also providing a tightening effect that is valuable in anti-aging skincare. Its emulsifying and stabilizing capabilities improve the consistency and longevity of creams, lotions, serums, mascaras, eyeliners, lipsticks, and shower gels. The gum supports clean label trends and is suitable for vegetarian and vegan consumers, aligning with the growing demand for ethical, sustainable, and transparent cosmetic ingredients. Packaged typically in 25 kg bags, with other packaging options available on request, DemeCare Acacia senegal S is a reliable, natural ingredient for formulators seeking to create high-performance, eco-friendly personal care products.

DemeCare Acacia senegal IO by Alland & Robert is a natural, vegetal gum derived from the exudate of the Acacia senegal tree. This ingredient is presented in a fluid, easily soluble form that dissolves in both hot and cold liquids, exhibiting Newtonian behavior and stability across a wide pH range (4 to 10) and temperature variations. It is 100% natural, biodegradable, organic, and sustainably sourced, with COSMOS certification ensuring compliance with organic and natural cosmetic standards. DemeCare Acacia senegal IO functions as a multifunctional agent in personal care formulations, serving as a texturing, adhesion, binding, suspension, film-forming, and emulsion stabilizing agent. It imparts a silky effect, shine, tightening, and moisturizing benefits, enhancing the sensory experience and performance of cosmetic products. Its versatility makes it suitable for a broad range of applications including skincare products like creams, lotions, serums, and moisturizing milks; decorative cosmetics such as mascaras, eyeliners, lipsticks, foundations, and face powders; as well as cleansing products like shower gels. The gum supports the formulation of natural, clean-label, and organic cosmetics by replacing petrochemical ingredients, contributing to product stability, texture, and consistency. Additionally, its sustainable harvesting supports local African communities and environmental conservation, aligning with the growing market demand for ethical and responsible cosmetic ingredients.

DemeCare Acacia senegal SO by Alland & Robert is an organic, spray-dried natural gum derived from the exudate of the Acacia senegal tree. This 100% natural, biodegradable, and sustainable ingredient is presented in a fine powder form, making it easy to incorporate into cosmetic formulations. It serves multiple functions including emulsification, texturizing, film formation, and stabilization, which contribute to the improved texture, consistency, and sensory appeal of personal care products. DemeCare Acacia senegal SO is highly effective as a texturing agent, tightening agent, adhesion and binding agent, emulsion stabilizer, suspensoid, and film-forming agent, while also imparting shine and moisturizing effects. It is stable across a wide pH range (4 to 10) and resistant to temperature variations, ensuring product integrity. This gum is widely used in creams, lotions, serums, shower gels, mascaras, eyeliners, lipsticks, and powder foundations, enhancing product performance by providing smooth application, improved adhesion, and a protective film on the skin. Certified organic and COSMOS-approved, it supports environmentally respectful production and sustainable harvesting practices that benefit local African communities and ecosystems. DemeCare Acacia senegal SO meets the growing demand for clean-label, ethical, and multifunctional cosmetic ingredients suitable for sensitive skin and vegan formulations.

DemeCare Acacia seyal I by Alland & Robert is a 100% natural, biodegradable, and sustainable vegetal gum derived from the dried exudation of the Acacia seyal tree's stems and branches. This high molecular polysaccharide gum is obtained through careful harvesting without chemical modification, ensuring its organic integrity and environmental responsibility. It features a fluid texture with Newtonian behavior, is easily soluble in both hot and cold liquids up to 40% concentration, and remains stable across a wide pH range of 4 to 10 as well as under temperature variations. Functionally, DemeCare Acacia seyal I serves as a versatile ingredient in cosmetic formulations, acting as an emulsifier, texturing agent, film-forming agent, thickener, stabilizer, adhesion and binding agent, and suspensoid agent. It enhances the texture, stability, and appearance of creams, lotions, serums, and other personal care products, contributing to a tightening effect, shine, and moisturising benefits. The product is COSMOS-certified and holds the maximum rating under ISO 16128 standards for natural and organic cosmetics, reflecting its compliance with stringent environmental and quality criteria. Packaged typically in 25 kg bags with other options available on request, DemeCare Acacia seyal I supports the growing consumer demand for clean-label, vegan, and ethically sourced ingredients. Its sustainable sourcing also benefits local communities and promotes ecological balance by aiding soil fertility and water cycle regulation. Overall, DemeCare Acacia seyal I is an ideal natural gum for formulators seeking to create effective, stable, and environmentally friendly cosmetic products with simplified ingredient lists.

DemeCare Acacia seyal S by Alland & Robert is a natural, spray-dried gum composed entirely of Acacia seyal exudate, harvested sustainably from the Acacia seyal tree. This 100% plant-based, biodegradable, and organic ingredient is designed for use in natural and organic cosmetics, meeting stringent certifications such as COSMOS and ISO 16128. It functions as a versatile multifunctional agent, providing texturing, tightening, adhesion, binding, emulsification, suspension, film formation, shine, and moisturizing effects. Its fluid, Newtonian behavior allows easy solubilization in hot or cold liquids up to 40% concentration, with stability across a wide pH range (4 to 10) and resistance to temperature variations. DemeCare Acacia seyal S enhances the texture and consistency of creams, lotions, serums, and color cosmetics like mascaras, eyeliners, and lipsticks, contributing to smooth application, long-lasting wear, and improved skin feel. By simplifying formulations and replacing multiple additives, it supports cleaner, vegan, and sustainable cosmetic products aligned with consumer demand for natural ingredients. Packaged typically in 25kg bags, this gum also supports environmental sustainability and local communities through responsible sourcing.

DemeCare Acacia seyal IO is a premium, instant soluble, organic form of Acacia seyal gum produced by Alland & Robert. This natural gum is derived from the dried exudation of the Acacia seyal tree's stems and branches, making it 100% natural, vegetal, biodegradable, and sustainable. It is COSMOS-certified, ensuring compliance with organic and natural cosmetic standards, and supports ethical sourcing and environmental sustainability. The product exhibits multifunctional properties, serving as a texturing agent, emulsifier, film-forming agent, adhesion and binding agent, suspensoid, and tightening agent. It imparts a silky effect, shine, and moisturizing benefits to cosmetic formulations. DemeCare Acacia seyal IO is easily soluble in hot or cold liquids, stable across a wide pH range (4 to 10), and resistant to temperature variations, making it highly versatile and user-friendly in formulation processes. Its fluid, Newtonian texture allows for smooth incorporation into a variety of personal care products such as creams, lotions, serums, shower gels, and makeup items including mascaras, eyeliners, and lipsticks. By replacing synthetic polymers and xanthan gum, it aligns with clean label, vegan, and natural cosmetic trends, while also contributing positively to soil fertility, water cycles, and biodiversity through sustainable harvesting practices. Overall, DemeCare Acacia seyal IO is an excellent choice for formulators seeking a natural, effective, and eco-friendly ingredient to enhance the texture, stability, and sensory qualities of organic and natural cosmetic products.

DemeCare Acacia seyal SO is a premium natural gum product manufactured by Alland & Robert, derived exclusively from the dried exudation of the Acacia seyal tree's stems and branches. This organic, spray-dried gum is 100% natural, vegetal, biodegradable, and sustainably sourced, aligning with COSMOS certification standards and the highest ISO 16128 ratings for natural and organic cosmetic ingredients. It exhibits excellent solubility in both hot and cold liquids, with the ability to dissolve up to 40% concentration, and maintains stability across a broad pH range of 4 to 10, as well as resistance to temperature variations. Functionally, DemeCare Acacia seyal SO serves as a versatile texturizing, film-forming, emulsifying, and stabilizing agent, providing a fluid texture with Newtonian behavior. Its benefits include enhancing product texture, imparting a tightening effect, improving adhesion and binding, stabilizing emulsions, and delivering a moisturizing and shiny finish. These properties make it highly suitable for diverse cosmetic applications such as creams, sun creams, serums, moisturizing milks, lotions, shower gels, face powders, foundations, mascaras, eyeliners, and water-based liquid lipsticks. The product supports clean label trends by simplifying formulations and replacing multiple additives, while also promoting ethical sourcing that benefits local African communities and contributes to environmental sustainability through land restoration and water cycle regulation. Packaged typically in 25kg bags, DemeCare Acacia seyal SO embodies the natural care ethos of the Demecare® range, combining efficacy with ecological responsibility for modern natural cosmetic formulations.

DemeCare Sterculia Gum, manufactured by Alland & Robert, is a 100% natural, biodegradable, and sustainable vegetal gum obtained from the exudation of the Sterculia urens tree, primarily found in Africa and India. This amber-colored gum is harvested by cutting the trunk or branches of the tree, resulting in a natural exudate that is mechanically processed without chemical modification, ensuring its organic integrity. It functions as a versatile ingredient in personal care formulations, serving as a texturizing agent, emulsifier, film-forming agent, thickener, and suspending agent. DemeCare Sterculia Gum exhibits strong water absorption capacity, stability across a wide pH range (4 to 10), and resistance to temperature variations, making it suitable for diverse cosmetic applications such as creams, lotions, shower gels, and makeup products. Its multifunctional properties enhance product texture, adhesion, and stability while providing a smooth sensory experience. Certified COSMOS and rated at the maximum level according to ISO 16128 standards, this gum aligns with clean label trends and consumer demand for natural, eco-friendly, and ethically sourced ingredients. Packaged typically in 25 kg bags, DemeCare Sterculia Gum supports sustainable development and local communities, making it an ideal choice for formulators seeking high-performance, natural cosmetic ingredients.

DemeCare Sterculia Gum O, manufactured by Alland & Robert, is an organic, natural gum derived from the exudate of the Sterculia urens tree, commonly known as gum karaya. This biodegradable and sustainable ingredient is composed primarily of polysaccharides such as D-galacturonic acid, D-galactose, and L-rhamnose. It is presented in a powder form and is available in 25 kg bags, with other packaging options upon request. DemeCare Sterculia Gum O serves multiple functional roles in personal care formulations, including acting as a texturing agent, emulsifier, film-forming agent, stabilizer, suspending agent, binding agent, adhesion agent, and sensory improver. It enhances product texture by providing a smooth, silky effect without shine or moisturizing properties. Its strong water absorption capacity and ability to form shear-thinning gels make it ideal for thickening and stabilizing emulsions across a wide pH range (4 to 10). The gum disperses easily in hot or cold conditions, especially in the presence of glycerine or ethanol, and exhibits good resistance to temperature variations. DemeCare Sterculia Gum O supports eco-friendly and ethical cosmetic formulations by replacing multiple additives, aligning with consumer demand for natural, plant-based, and sustainable ingredients. Additionally, its cultivation benefits local African communities and contributes to environmental restoration. This multifunctional organic gum is widely used in personal care products such as exfoliating gels, hair styling formulations, and other cosmetics requiring stable emulsions, improved texture, and film-forming properties.

PRODUCT_NAME: Blend DemeCare Acacia senegal I / Sterculia Gum
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Blend DemeCare Acacia senegal I / Sterculia Gum by Alland & Robert is a natural gum blend composed of Acacia senegal gum and Sterculia urens gum, both harvested directly from trees without chemical modification. This blend is a versatile ingredient designed for use in personal care and cosmetic formulations, offering multiple functional benefits. It acts as a texturizing agent, emulsifier, film-forming agent, and binding agent, providing stable emulsions and enhancing product texture and sensory experience. The blend also delivers a tightening and moisturizing effect, improving skin appearance and hydration by forming a continuous protective film. Its strong adhesion and suspension properties ensure uniform distribution of ingredients in formulations such as creams, lotions, serums, shower gels, foundations, mascaras, eyeliners, and water-based liquid lipsticks. Both components are biodegradable, sustainable, and COSMOS certified, supporting environmentally responsible and organic cosmetic production. The blend is stable across a wide pH range and temperature variations, making it suitable for diverse cosmetic applications. Packaged typically in 25 kg bags, Blend DemeCare Acacia senegal I / Sterculia Gum simplifies formulations by replacing multiple additives with one multifunctional natural ingredient, aligning with consumer demand for clean, vegan, and eco-friendly products while supporting ethical sourcing and local communities in Africa.

PRODUCT_NAME: Blend DemeCare Acacia senegal IO / Sterculia Gum O
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Blend DemeCare Acacia senegal IO / Sterculia Gum O is a natural gum blend developed by Alland & Robert as part of their Demecare® range, combining Acacia senegal gum (instant soluble) and organic Sterculia gum. This blend is presented in a powder form that dissolves easily in hot or cold liquids, offering a fluid, Newtonian texture with stability across a wide pH range (4 to 10) and resistance to temperature variations. The Acacia senegal IO component is instant soluble, allowing solubilisation up to 40% concentration, while Sterculia Gum O is organic with strong water absorption and shear-thinning gel properties. The blend delivers multifunctional benefits including texturing, tightening, adhesion, binding, emulsion stabilization, suspensoid action, film formation, a silky effect, shine, and moisturization. It is COSMOS certified and rated highly under ISO 16128 standards, ensuring natural and organic quality. The product supports sustainable sourcing from the Sahel region of Africa, benefiting local communities and the environment. Its versatility makes it ideal for use in a wide range of cosmetic formulations such as creams, lotions, serums, exfoliating gels, makeup, and hair care products, where it replaces synthetic polymers and simplifies formulations while meeting consumer demand for clean, ethical, and environmentally responsible ingredients.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: In an exfoliating gel formula example, DemeCare Sterculia gum is used at 2.08% and DemeCare Acacia senegal I at 0.92%. No specific dosage frequency or administration route is provided.

SUPPLIER_NAME: Sanming AF Silicon Materials Co., Ltd.
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: AFSIL® DT 220, produced by Sanming AF Silicon Materials Co., Ltd., is a high-purity precipitated silicon dioxide specifically engineered for oral care applications, particularly toothpaste formulations. This free-flowing white powder boasts excellent whiteness (≥96%) and an evenly distributed particle size, ensuring superior compatibility with active ingredients such as sodium fluoride. With a silicon dioxide content of at least 96%, it features high water absorption (43-58 ml/20g) and oil absorption (≥220 ml/100g), combined with low abrasion power and low cleaning power, making it gentle on tooth enamel while providing excellent thickening properties. These characteristics enhance the formability and texture of transparent, translucent, and opaque toothpaste products. AFSIL® DT 220 is also notable for its low heavy metal content, negative sulfide presence, and compliance with stringent microbiological standards, ensuring safety and quality. Certified under ISO 9001, ISO 22000, GMP, HALAL, and KOSHER, and conforming to USP-NF and EP monographs, this product is a reliable and effective ingredient for oral care formulations. Packaged in 10 kg bags or supersacks, it should be stored in a cool, ventilated place away from moisture and direct sunlight, with a shelf life of 24 months.

DERMOL DIA, manufactured by Alzo International Inc., is a clear, colorless liquid composed primarily of Diisopropyl Adipate (Bis(1-Methylethyl) Hexanedioate). It features a faint characteristic odor, a specific gravity of 0.96 at 25°C, and a molecular weight of 230. This versatile ingredient is highly valued in the personal care industry for its excellent emollient properties, providing a non-oily, lubricious feel with mild dry effects. DERMOL DIA is especially compatible with hydro-alcoholic cosmetic formulations, making it ideal for use in pre-electric and after-shave lotions. Its applications extend to bath oils, lipsticks, men's grooming aids, creams, hand lotions, suntan gels, colognes, toilet waters, and skin fresheners. The product boasts a high flash point over 170°C and a freeze point below -2.0°C, ensuring stability in various formulations. Additionally, DERMOL DIA is soluble in alcohols, glycols, ketones, esters, silicones, and a range of hydrocarbons, but insoluble in water, ethylene glycol, and glycerol. It meets Clean at Sephora, Credo Clean Standard, and Ulta Beauty's Conscious Beauty labeling standards, highlighting its suitability for clean and sensitive skin formulations. Overall, DERMOL DIA is a reliable, multifunctional emollient that enhances skin feel, improves product texture, and supports a wide array of cosmetic and personal care applications.

A-C® 629 Oxidized PE Homopolymer, manufactured by Honeywell International Inc., is a low-density oxidized polyethylene (LDOxPE) homopolymer presented in prill form. This versatile additive is primarily used as a rheological aid in solvent-borne coatings, enhancing flow and application properties. It also serves as an effective metal release agent in PVC processing, facilitating easier demolding and improved surface finish. Additionally, A-C® 629 can be atmospherically emulsified for aqueous applications, making it suitable for use in textiles, lubricants, coatings, and inks. The product imparts beneficial surface characteristics such as a lower coefficient of friction, increased slip, and enhanced mar and abrasion resistance, which contribute to improved durability and performance of finished products. Its physical properties include a hardness of 5.5 dmm, viscosity of 200 at 140°C, a drop point of 101°C, density of 0.93, and an acid number of 15. The prill form facilitates easy handling and incorporation into formulations. A-C® 629 is supported by regulatory approvals including FDA indirect and direct food additive approvals, making it suitable for various industrial applications. Its strengths lie in improving processing efficiency and end-product quality across multiple sectors, particularly in coatings and plastics.

AdvensProtect OE, manufactured by SEQENS, is a multifunctional cosmetic ingredient blend composed primarily of caprylyl glycol and ethylhexylglycerin. This clear, colorless to light yellow liquid offers a unique combination of moisturizing, emollient, and preservative-boosting properties, making it highly valuable in personal care formulations. Caprylyl glycol enhances skin hydration by integrating with skin lipids, improving moisture retention, and regulating viscosity to improve the sensory profile of products by reducing tackiness and enhancing texture. Ethylhexylglycerin contributes emollient activity, providing a smooth and soft skin feel, while also offering deodorant efficacy by combating odor-causing bacteria. Additionally, AdvensProtect OE acts as a preservative booster, enhancing the effectiveness of traditional preservatives and antimicrobial agents, thereby improving product stability and safety. Its versatility allows it to be used in a wide range of personal care products, including moisturizers, lotions, creams, deodorants, hair care, and color cosmetics. Furthermore, AdvensProtect OE is a 100% biobased ingredient, aligning with the growing demand for sustainable and eco-friendly cosmetic solutions. The product has a specific gravity of 0.929-0.942 at 20°C, a refractive index of 1.442-1.455, and a maximum Hazen color value of 100, with a characteristic odor. It is certified HALAL, K, and holds a PLATINUM Top 1% 2023 Ecovadis Sustainability Rating, reflecting its quality and sustainability credentials. AdvensProtect OE is supplied with a shelf life of two years when stored properly in its original container, tightly closed, and kept in a well-ventilated location.

Adenosine from Selco Wirkstoffe Vertriebs GmbH is a white or almost white crystalline powder with the molecular formula C10H13N5O4, consisting of adenine attached to ribose via a ß N9 glycosidic bond. It is a naturally occurring nucleoside and one of the four nucleoside building blocks of DNA and RNA, playing a crucial role in cellular functions such as signal transduction through cyclic Adenosine monophosphate (cAMP). This high-purity (≥98%) ingredient is known for its potent cytoprotective and anti-inflammatory properties, primarily through activation of A2A receptors, which help prevent tissue damage and promote skin repair. Adenosine effectively reduces inflammation, wrinkles, and fine lines while enhancing skin texture and night repair processes. It also supports wound healing and stress relief. In hair care, adenosine promotes hair thickening and growth comparable to minoxidil but with higher user satisfaction due to faster prevention of hair loss and stimulation of new hair appearance. It is soluble in water and aqueous glycol solutions, making it suitable for incorporation into daily cosmetic products such as creams, lotions, face masks, gels, ampoules, body care, and hair care formulations at concentrations ranging from 0.04% to 0.5%. Non-hazardous at normal use concentrations, adenosine should be stored in a dry, light-protected environment between 10°C and 25°C, with a shelf life of three years in original containers. This versatile ingredient is ideal for anti-aging, soothing, skin barrier enhancement, and hair growth applications, making it a valuable addition to modern personal care products.
CLAIMS: ['Anti-Aging', 'Anti-Inflammatory', 'Anti-Stress', 'Anti-Wrinkle', 'Elasticity', 'Hair Loss Reduction', 'Hair Volume', 'Skin Renewal', 'Skin Repair', 'Smoothing', 'Soothing', 'Wound Healing']

APPLICATIONS: ['Air Care', 'Antiperspirants & Deodorants', 'Fragrance', 'Hair Care', 'Skin Care', 'Soap & Bath', 'Spa & Wellness']
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ALDEHYDE 160768 from LUZI (Malaysia) Sdn Bhd is a complex fragrance raw material blend designed primarily for use in personal care and cosmetic products. This product is composed of a carefully balanced mixture of aldehydes and other aromatic compounds, including alpha-Hexyl cinnamaldehyde, Benzyl acetate, Phenethyl alcohol, and 4-tert-Butylcyclohexyl acetate, each present in concentrations ranging from 10-20%, along with several other fragrance components such as Terpineol, d-Limonene, Methyl ionone, and Geraniol in smaller amounts. The formulation totals 100%, with 86% being fragrance raw materials above 1% concentration and 14% non-hazardous raw materials below 1%. ALDEHYDE 160768 is typically a liquid form, given the nature of its constituents, and is designed to impart complex, multi-faceted scent profiles that enhance the olfactory experience of personal care products. Its strengths lie in its ability to act as a fragrance enhancer and fixative, helping to stabilize and prolong the scent in formulations such as perfumes, lotions, creams, and body oils. The presence of various aldehydes and esters contributes to a rich, nuanced aroma that can provide floral, musky, citrus, and woody notes. This makes ALDEHYDE 160768 suitable for use in a wide range of cosmetic and personal care applications where sophisticated fragrance profiles are desired, including shampoos, bath products, and skincare items. Additionally, aldehydes in the formulation may also contribute to preservative effects and product stability, further enhancing the product's utility in cosmetic formulations.

1,2-Hexanediol from WeylChem ORGANICA GmbH is a high-purity chemical compound with a molecular formula of C6H14O2 and a molecular weight of 118.18. It appears as a clear, colorless to light yellow liquid with a minimum purity of 98.0% and a water content of no more than 0.3%. This vic-Hexylene Glycol features hydroxyl groups on the first and second carbon atoms, contributing to its multifunctional properties. Widely used in the cosmetics industry, 1,2-Hexanediol serves as an effective humectant, emollient, solvent, and preservative enhancer. It attracts and retains moisture, softens and smooths the skin, stabilizes fragrances, and boosts the efficacy of preservatives, thereby extending product shelf life. Additionally, it exhibits antimicrobial properties and acts as a skin conditioning agent, improving the texture and feel of personal care formulations. Its versatility makes it suitable for use in skincare products such as moisturizers, lotions, and serums, as well as haircare and makeup products. The product should be stored in a cool, dry place, tightly closed to maintain its quality.

APPLICATIONS: ['Air Care', 'Antiperspirants & Deodorants', 'Bath & Toilet Cleaner', 'Car Care', 'Color Care', 'Dishwashing', 'Fabric care', 'Floor & Surface Cleaner', 'Fragrance', 'Hair Care', 'Household Polishes', 'Institutional Cleaner', 'Institutional Laundry', 'Laundry', 'Skin Care', 'Soap & Bath', 'Spa & Wellness']
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: AMY 650050-D is a fragrance compound produced by LUZI (Malaysia) Sdn Bhd, characterized by its slightly yellow to light yellow oily liquid form. It exhibits a fruity, flowery, and musky odor profile, making it suitable for use in various fragrance applications. The product has a specific gravity ranging from 0.969 to 0.975 at 20/4°C and a refractive index between 1.4821 and 1.4881, indicating its consistent physical properties. With a flash point of 114.0 to 116.0 °C (Pensky-Martens closed cup method), AMY 650050-D is stable under typical handling and storage conditions, although color changes may occur over time. This fragrance compound complies with the stringent Quality and Safety Standards of the International Fragrance Association (IFRA), specifically adhering to the 51st Amendment to the IFRA Code of Practice as of June 30, 2023. Such compliance ensures its safety and suitability for use in fragrance formulations. While specific applications in personal care or other industries are not detailed, its olfactory characteristics and safety certification suggest potential use in perfumes, cosmetics, and other scented products where a fruity, flowery, and musky aroma is desired. The product is manufactured in Malaysia and distributed by LUZI, a reputable company with a global presence, ensuring quality and regulatory adherence.

DIJI BLUE INTENSE SOHK068152 is a complex mixture of aromatic raw materials produced by PT SOZIO DESCOLLONGES INDONESIA, designed for industrial and professional use. This liquid product ranges in color from colorless to yellow and exhibits a characteristic odor. It is composed of various aromatic compounds including linalyl acetate, limonene, linalool, and patchouli alcohol, among others, each contributing to its unique olfactory profile. The product has a flash point of 86 °C and is partially soluble in ethanol, with a refractive index between 1.447 and 1.467 and a specific gravity ranging from 0.968 to 0.988 at 20°C. DIJI BLUE INTENSE SOHK068152 is intended for use in environments requiring aromatic mixtures, potentially in perfumery or fragrance applications, given its composition. It is important to handle this product with care due to its classification as causing skin irritation, serious eye damage, and potential allergic skin reactions, as well as its toxicity to aquatic life with long-lasting effects. Protective measures such as wearing gloves, eye protection, and avoiding environmental release are recommended. The product is stable under normal conditions but may release hazardous gases like carbon monoxide and dioxide upon thermal decomposition. Overall, DIJI BLUE INTENSE SOHK068152 offers a potent aromatic blend suitable for industrial fragrance formulations, emphasizing safety and environmental precautions during handling and disposal.

PRODUCT_NAME: ADCL-SC-1 Ceramide NP composite treated spherical porous silica
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ADCL-SC-1 Ceramide NP composite treated spherical porous silica is a specialized cosmetic ingredient developed by ILLUCO POWDER. This product consists primarily of silica (89.7 - 94.7%) that is spherical and porous in structure, treated with a composite containing ceramide NP, hydrogenated lecithin, dimethicone, triethoxycaprylylsilane, and aluminum hydroxide. The inclusion of ceramide NP (0.2 - 0.8%) is significant for its well-known skin barrier repair and moisturizing properties, while the porous silica base offers excellent oil absorption and shine control. The composite treatment enhances the hydrophobicity of the particles, allowing them to float on still water for over an hour, indicating strong water-repellent characteristics. This multifunctional powder is designed to improve skin hydration, restore the skin's natural barrier, and provide a matte finish by controlling excess oil. It is suitable for use in personal care and cosmetic formulations where skin barrier enhancement and oil control are desired. The product complies with the Safety and Technical Standards for Cosmetics of the People's Republic of China and undergoes rigorous testing for heavy metals and microbial contamination to ensure safety and quality.

Collapeptyl™ biofunctional by Ashland is an advanced biofunctional ingredient presented in a gel form, designed to enhance skin health and appearance through its innovative collagen peptide technology. This cutting-edge formulation combines hyaluronic acid with peptides, creating a unique hyalupeptide hybrid that mimics and boosts 20 types of collagen within the skin's "collaverse," an interconnected ecosystem of diverse collagens. The product is vegan, PFAS-free, and 99.7% natural, aligning with clean beauty and sustainability standards. Collapeptyl™ biofunctional delivers rapid efficacy, with clinical studies showing significant improvements in skin elasticity, hydration, and plumpness within 30 minutes of application. Users experience an instant glass-like, glowing skin appearance within 4 hours, with visible correction of expression wrinkles in 4 hours and deep wrinkles in 1 month. Its smooth, velvet-like sensory feel enhances the user experience, making it ideal for incorporation into anti-wrinkle, age-defying, pro-collagen, hyaluronic acid boosters, regenerative and repair cosmetic care, plumping and firming products, as well as make-up hybrids like BB creams and tinted serums. This versatile ingredient represents a significant advancement in skincare, offering both immediate and long-term benefits through its innovative approach to collagen enhancement and skin rejuvenation.

Collapeptyl™ by Ashland is a cutting-edge biofunctional ingredient designed to enhance skin health and appearance through a unique combination of peptides and hyaluronic acid within a cellulosic matrix. Composed of water, glycerin, cellulose gum, hydrolyzed sodium hyaluronate, tripeptide-1, and hexapeptide-9, this vegan and 99.7% natural-origin ingredient leverages patented 2HP™ technology to synergistically boost the expression of 20 interconnected collagen chains in the skin's complex "Collaverse" ecosystem. Clinically proven to deliver rapid and long-lasting anti-aging benefits, Collapeptyl™ offers immediate effects such as a glass-like radiant glow, plumping, and a velvety smooth skin feel after just one application. It effectively reduces the appearance of expression and deep wrinkles, improves skin elasticity, hydration, and suppleness, and enhances skin firmness and dermal architecture. Its dual-action power combines sensorial benefits—providing a luxurious velvet touch and smooth effect—with potent anti-aging and hydrating properties. Suitable for diverse personal care applications, Collapeptyl™ is ideal for anti-wrinkle creams, pro-collagen and hyaluronic acid boosters, regenerative skincare, collagen masks, plumping and firming products, as well as makeup hybrids like BB creams and tinted serums. Additionally, it aligns with clean beauty trends by being PFAS-free, readily biodegradable, and supporting sustainable cosmetic formulations.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: Recommended use level: 3 to 5% (clinically tested at 5%)

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Advantage™ S solution by Ashland is an aqueous solution of a Vinyl Caprolactam/VP/Dimethylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, presented as a clear, colorless to straw yellow liquid with a 30% solids content. This polymer functions as a film former and hair fixative, delivering strong, durable hold with a stiff yet flexible feel, making it ideal for hair styling applications such as sprays, gels, creams, and mousses. It offers excellent high humidity curl retention, frizz control, and imparts a glossy shine that enhances hair color and appearance. Advantage™ S solution is highly versatile, compatible with a broad range of ingredients including anionic thickeners, and exhibits broad propellant tolerance, enabling the formulation of both alcohol-free and VOC-compliant styling products. It requires no neutralization and is cold processable, simplifying manufacturing. The product is preserved with Diazolidinyl Urea, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, and Propylene Glycol, with an alternative phenoxyethanol-preserved version available. Its recommended use level is 1-5% solids, and it is best added after neutralizing acidic batch ingredients. Overall, Advantage™ S solution enhances hair styling formulations by providing strong hold, humidity resistance, shine, and formulation flexibility, making it a valuable ingredient for modern personal care products.
